thread.title: Fantasy sports’ transformation bets on million-dollar dreams
thread.title_full: Fantasy sports’ transformation bets on million-dollar dreams - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Fantasy sports’ transformation bets on million-dollar dreams
text:
Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle Josh Margulies poses for a portrait on Wed. October 7, 2015, in Sunnyvale, Calif. Margulies is an avid fantasy sports player. Josh Margulies poses for a portrait on Wed. October 7, 2015, in...
Josh Margulies is a 36-year-old director of marketing at a health care company. He has three young kids and spends two-plus hours each day navigating commute traffic between his home in Morgan Hill and his office in Sunnyvale. Josh Margulies poses for a portrait on Wed. October 7, 2015, in Sunnyvale, Calif. Margulies is an avid fantasy sports player. Josh Margulies poses for a portrait on Wed. October 7, 2015, in...
Josh Margulies is a 36-year-old director of marketing at a health care company. He has three young kids and spends two-plus hours each day navigating commute traffic between his home in Morgan Hill and his office in Sunnyvale.
